lead_paragraph: MOTELSON--Stuart, of New York City, on July 7, 2016, at the age of 74. Father of Peter (Hillary) and Glenn (Jenny) Motelson, and beloved grandfather of four. A Bronx boy, born May 25, 1942, and a graduate of Syracuse University and NY Law School, he enjoyed a successful career as a real estate attorney with ABC/Disney, raised his family in Westchester County and returned to the Upper West Side. Warm and witty, he will be missed dearly by his family and many friends. In addition to his children and grandchildren, he is also survived by his sister Carole Jaffe. Interred at King Solomon in Clifton, NJ on July 10. Donations may be sent to Lighthouse / Jewish Guild for the Blind, www.lighthouseguild.org 1/3
